title:
Speedy Chicken Parmesan Soup
ACTIVE TIME
5m
TOTAL TIME
20m
5 servings
directions: In a large stockpot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Stir in onion and garlic and cook for two minutes. Add thyme, fennel, pepper and salt. Stir to combine and cook for 3 more minutes, until onion is softened. Add tomato paste and stir to coat the onion. Add tomatoes, broth and chicken, then bring to a boil. When boiling, add pasta and cook until noodles are just tender, about 10 to 11 minutes. Stir in basil and serve, topping with Parmesan cheese.
